channel.title: linux on amandamata
channel.description: Recent content in linux on amandamata

item.title: Understanding folders in linux
item.description: You’ve just installed linux and you’re used to the structure of windows and its directories, so you’ll take a look in your file manager looking for the disk C: and you can’t find it… Knowing Linux directories can help administer the system and understand how it works. If we analyze windows and linux, they ended up evolving differently in terms of directory structure. Linux is much more like any other system with unix roots like macOS.
